availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Carsten A. Waudelohr (Pendleton County Circuit Court clerk)

body.p: Pendleton County Circuit Court clerk. Pennsylvania native. Married Rachael Hitch Waudelohr in 1857. Pendleton County Circuit Court Clerk from 1863 to 1868.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1307. KYR-0001-029-0396. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 2, p. 328. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Pendleton County, 1857. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 356. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 411. “Carston Augustus Wandelohr,” Find A Grave, November 4, 2009, memorial no. 43937176.
